function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The study involves analyzing energy consumption in buildings, which could be a potential indicator of building occupancy and human activity, both of which contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Without proper analysis and mitigation, high energy consumption in buildings could indicate high occupancy and increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy monitoring systems and promoting energy-efficient practices can help reduce the risk of high occupancy and contagious disease transmission.","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, data analytics for energy usage, and energy-efficient building design and management technologies.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health officials.","Owner":"Facility management, public health agencies, building owners."}]}
